segments.text: There are so many eating utensils on the table . Which ones do I use first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Use them from the outside in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . A set for appetizers and another for the main course .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . We do the same thing at home . Don't you remember ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh yeah . The big napkin goes on my lap .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cindy , help me order because I'm still not very familiar with American cooking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we order appetizers first and then entrees .
segments.speaker: S2
